comments:
Driver: TPTP-4.3.0-200610090100
Platforms: local is Windows XP and remote has been tested with Windows ia32 and HP-UX

When I have security enabled on the remote RAC, I get a Null Pointer Exception as soon as I try to import the remote log file. The Error log shows the following:

Changed to platform.Communication because it appears to be a problem with the RAC. If you first test the host connection, the null pointer will be thrown but the remote log import will succeed on a second attempt.

I had the the NPE when I do the test connection to a remote RAC which has security enabled. If I do the test connection second time, I can get the pop window for "Connection success". After this, I can successfully import a log from the remote machine.
